title: Rick Springfield Announces 2025 “I Want My ’80s Tour”
description: John Waite and Wang Chung will support on all dates. Rick Springfield Announces 2025 “I Want My ’80s Tour” Eddie Fu
author: Eddie Fu
excerpt: Rick Springfield has announced his 2025 "I Want My '80s Tour" with John Waite and Wang Chung supporting on all dates.
text: Rick Springfield has announced his 2025 “I Want My ’80s Tour.” He will be joined by John Waite and Wang Chung for the entirety of the late spring and summer run, with Paul Young and John Cafferty appearing on select dates. Get Rick Springfield Tickets Here The trek kicks off on May 29th in St. Augustine, Florida, and will make subsequent stops in cities like Charlotte, Cincinnati, Atlantic City, Dallas, and more before wrapping up on August 10th in Henderson, Nevada. See Springfield’s full tour schedule below. A fan club pre-sale (sign up here) is ongoing ahead of the general on-sale beginning Friday, February 14th via Ticketmaster. During the 2023 edition of Springfield’s “I Want My ’80s Tour,” he was also joined by Waite, as well as The Hooters, Paul Young, and Tommy Tutone. That same year, he released his most recent album, Automatic. Get your copy here. Rick Springfield 2025 Tour Dates: 02/17 – Atlanta, GA @ Atlanta Symphony Hall ^ 02/18 – Huntsville, AL @ Mark C. Smith Concert Hall ^ 02/19 – Nashville, TN @ Ryman Auditorium ^ 03/19 – Macon, GA @ Macon City Auditorium 03/20 – Myrtle Beach, SC @ The Carolina Opry Theater 05/29 – St. Augustine, FL @ St. Augustine Amphitheater * 05/31 – Brandon, MS @ Brandon Amphitheatre * 06/01 – Gautier, MS @ The Sound Amphitheatre * 06/03 – Charlotte, NC @ Skyla Credit Union * 06/04 – Raleigh, NC @ Red Hat Amphitheatre * 06/06 – Portsmouth, VA @ Alt. html:
Rick Springfield has announced his 2025 “I Want My ’80s Tour.” He will be joined by John Waite and Wang Chung for the entirety of the late spring and summer run, with Paul Young and John Cafferty appearing on select dates.

Get Rick Springfield Tickets Here

The trek kicks off on May 29th in St. Augustine, Florida, and will make subsequent stops in cities like Charlotte, Cincinnati, Atlantic City, Dallas, and more before wrapping up on August 10th in Henderson, Nevada. See Springfield’s full tour schedule below.

A fan club pre-sale (sign up here) is ongoing ahead of the general on-sale beginning Friday, February 14th via Ticketmaster.

During the 2023 edition of Springfield’s “I Want My ’80s Tour,” he was also joined by Waite, as well as The Hooters, Paul Young, and Tommy Tutone. That same year, he released his most recent album, Automatic. Get your copy here.

Rick Springfield 2025 Tour Dates:
02/17 – Atlanta, GA @ Atlanta Symphony Hall ^
